Instance.description: Situation for the NPC hosted birthday party. The party will

Tunable.name: _default_job
Tunable.description: The default job for Sims in this situation

TunableTuple.name: age_up_host_backup_situation_state
TunableTuple.display: Age Up Host Backup Situation State
TunableTuple.description: Information related to the Age Up Host Backup Situation State.

TunableTuple.name: situation_state
TunableTuple.description: Backup Situation State. Hopefully this will never have to be used. In the case that the caterer is never able to make a cake or the host sim isn't able to run the age up interaction on the cake then this state will be entered. Within this state the host sim will attempt to be forced to age up.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

Tunable.name: time_out
Tunable.description: The amount of time since the beginning of the situation that we will be put into the Age Up Host Backup Situation State if we are not already in the Post Age Up Situation State.

TunableTuple.name: age_up_host_situation_state
TunableTuple.description: Second state of the situation. This state should start when the caterer has finished setting up the birthday cake. This situation state will have the host sim try and age up with the birthday cake.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: post_age_up_situation_state
TunableTuple.description: The third situation state. This state should encompass all of the situation behavior after the sim has aged up and will continue till the end of the party.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: preparation_situation_state
TunableTuple.description:
The first state of this situation. In this state sims should be socializing and the caterer should be preparing the birthday cake.
All jobs and role states should be defined in this situation state.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.
